profile.name: Rafael Mendes
profile.title: Senior Software Engineer
profile.summary: Experienced Brazilian Software Engineer with 16+ years in agile development. Known for clean code, strong documentation, and a passion for learning. Seeking new challenges with a great team at an exceptional company.

skills.title: A little bit about me
skills.description: A Brazilian Software Engineer with 16+ years of experience in agile development. I bring a mindset rooted in design patterns, clean architecture, and Linux. I build user-centred applications with strong documentation, always driven by a passion for learning and continuous improvement.

skills.title: React & Next.js
skills.description: React has been my frontend evolution, starting from Node.js and maturing through React 18, React Native 0.74, Next.js 13/14, and Expo. I follow SOLID principles, build reusable component architectures, and manage state with React Query, TanStack Table, React Hook Form, and Context API. I deliver pixel-perfect Figma-to-code implementations with consistent typography, spacing, and theming.

skills.title: TypeScript
skills.description: TypeScript 5+ is my standard for all frontend and backend work. I enforce type safety across monorepos, migrate legacy JavaScript codebases, and build typed interfaces for REST APIs, GraphQL schemas, and component libraries. Strong typing has been essential in maintaining quality across large-scale applications.

skills.title: PHP
skills.description: PHP has been a serious relationship since 2007, spanning pure PHP, Yii, Zend Framework I & II, Magento 1 & 2, and Laravel. In May 2010, I told Rasmus Lerdorf at IV ENSOL that I'd keep using PHP — 16 years later, it remains a core part of my backend expertise.

skills.title: Python
skills.description: Python has been with me since university, where I built 20+ 2D games with Pygame as part of the Firestorm team. Today I use it for backend services with FastAPI, AI integrations via the OpenAI API, critical backup systems, and automation tools. My Sperm Whale project demonstrates real-time transcription and translation using Whisper and multi-engine AI.

skills.title: Bash & Linux
skills.description: Bash scripting is pure Linux love, inherited from the GNU/Linux community. Since 2005, I've written scripts for server automation, AWS management, CI/CD pipelines, rollback procedures, and AI-powered diagnostics. My .bash_aliases project evolved into a cross-platform toolkit integrating Python and OpenAI for intelligent scripting.

skills.title: Angular
skills.description: Led frontend development with Angular 19 at Blocworx, building a high-performance no-code platform. I introduced standardised testing with Jest and Puppeteer, migrated codebases to TypeScript, and developed reusable npm packages. Implemented charting libraries like Chart.js and D3.js for complex workflow visualisation in admin dashboards.

skills.title: Java
skills.description: My Java journey includes optimising backend processing for Brazil's BGSD supercomputer at Dataprev, cutting batch times from 0.01s to 0.00001s. I refactored legacy academic models into high-performance big data solutions. As an OSUM Leader, I organised events promoting Java best practices across Brazil.

skills.title: DevOps & Tools
skills.description: Docker, Git-flow, CI/CD pipelines, and Linux server administration are core to my workflow. I build containerised development environments, manage AWS scripting, and enforce code quality through ESLint, Prettier, and thorough code reviews. I use Turborepo for monorepo management and Webpack 5 for build optimisation.

skills.title: Databases & APIs
skills.description: Experience across Firebase, MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, and Oracle. I design and consume REST APIs and GraphQL endpoints, integrate blockchain wallets via thirdweb SDK (ERC-20/721), and work with DatoCMS, OAuth 2.0 providers (Google, Microsoft, Yahoo), and the OpenAI API.
